name: Evolvice Team
tagline: Your Virtual Team - Germans living in Kiev
description:
Two German managers living and working in Kiev, Ukraine to staff and deliver your software development team productively.
Nearshoring works when you share a similar value system. We tend to connect the good things from East and West with German standards. We believe that business results evolve from a “healthy-agile” mindset
HQ in Stuttgart, 53 employees, founded 2016
Development Centre Kiev, Ukraine 
Agile “Plan-Build-Run” business model
Transparency throughout
All technologies: Java, PHP, .NET, Android, iOS…
Data storage and contracts in Germany
